name: Chained Angel
description: The Chained Angel is a celestial being bound by chains, with a strong build and fiery abilities.
memorable: Despite its celestial nature, it embodies a neutral evil alignment and possesses significant magical abilities.
goals: Seeking freedom from its chains and possibly vengeance against those who bound it.
relations: Can be associated with other celestial beings and may oppose fiends.
environment: Typically found in dark or corrupted places, where it might be constrained.
strengths: Highly mobile with exceptional Strength and Charisma, and resistant to fire and radiant damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to certain conditions, and its freedom is limited by the chains binding it.
attacks: Multiattack with Fiery Greatsword dealing slashing and fire damage, plus the ability to unleash radiant damage through Fallen Glory.
most_powerful_ability: Redemption allows it to retaliate against attempts to free it with unholy flames.
senses: Has darkvision extending 200 feet and a passive Perception score of 17.
skills: Proficient in Perception, enabling better detection of threats.
additional_information: Immune to fire and radiant damage
Can counter spells targeting cleric or paladin spells
Does not require food, drink, or sleep
Can unleash unholy flames when freed attempts are made
spellcasting: Has magical resistance with advantage on saving throws against spells.
